verses.verse: Whoso loveth <S%H157><s%> correction <S%H4148><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> is brutish <S%H1198><s%>.
A good <S%H2896><s%> man shall obtain <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; But a man <S%H376><s%> of wicked devices <S%H4209><s%> will he condemn <S%H7561><s%>.
A man <S%H120><s%> shall not be established <S%H3559><s%> by wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; But the root <S%H8328><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
A worthy <S%H2428><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> is the crown <S%H5850><s%> of her husband <S%H1167><s%>; But she that maketh ashamed <S%H954><s%> is as rottenness <S%H7538><s%> in his bones <S%H6106><s%>.
The thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> are just <S%H4941><s%>; But the counsels <S%H8458><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are deceit <S%H4820><s%>.

The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are of lying in wait <S%H693><s%> for blood <S%H1818><s%>; But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall deliver them <S%H5337><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are overthrown <S%H2015><s%>, and are not <S%H1004><s%>; But the house of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%>.
A man <S%H376><s%> shall be commended <S%H1984><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his wisdom <S%H7922><s%>; But he that is of a perverse <S%H5753><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be despised <S%H937><s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is he that is lightly esteemed <S%H7034><s%>, and hath a servant <S%H5650><s%>, Than he that honoreth <S%H3513><s%> himself <S%H2638><s%>, and lacketh bread <S%H3899><s%>.
A righteous <S%H6662><s%> man regardeth <S%H3045><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of his beast <S%H929><s%>; But the tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are cruel <S%H394><s%>.

He that tilleth <S%H5647><s%> his land <S%H127><s%> shall have plenty <S%H7646><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>; But he that followeth <S%H7291><s%> after vain <S%H7386><s%> persons is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> desireth <S%H2530><s%> the net <S%H4685><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men <S%H8328><s%>; But the root of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> yieldeth fruit <S%H5414><s%>.

In the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of the lips <S%H8193><s%> is a snare <S%H4170><s%> to the evil <S%H6869><s%> man <S%H6662><s%>; But the righteous shall come out <S%H3318><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

A man <S%H376><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> by the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; And the doings <S%H1576><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be rendered unto him <S%H7725><s%>.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of a fool <S%H191><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>; But he that is wise <S%H2450><s%> hearkeneth <S%H8085><s%> unto counsel <S%H6098><s%>.
A fool <S%H191><s%>'s vexation <S%H3708><s%> is presently <S%H3117><s%> known <S%H3045><s%>; But a prudent <S%H6175><s%> man concealeth <S%H3680><s%> shame <S%H7036><s%>.
He that uttereth <S%H6315><s%> truth <S%H530><s%> showeth forth <S%H5046><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; But a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>, deceit <S%H4820><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> that speaketh <S%H981><s%> rashly like the piercings <S%H4094><s%> of a sword <S%H2719><s%>; But the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is health <S%H4832><s%>.
The lip <S%H8193><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>; But a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> is but for a moment <S%H7280><s%>.
Deceit <S%H4820><s%> is in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them that devise <S%H2790><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>; But to the counsellors <S%H3289><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> is joy <S%H8057><s%>.
There shall no mischief <S%H205><s%> happen <S%H579><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with evil <S%H7451><s%>.
Lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; But they that deal <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H530><s%> are his delight <S%H7522><s%>.
A prudent <S%H6175><s%> man <S%H120><s%> concealeth <S%H3680><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But the heart <S%H3820><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> proclaimeth <S%H7121><s%> foolishness <S%H200><s%>.
The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> shall bear rule <S%H4910><s%>; But the slothful <S%H7423><s%> shall be put under taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.
Heaviness <S%H1674><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> maketh it stoop <S%H7812><s%>; But a good <S%H2896><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> maketh it glad <S%H8055><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a guide <S%H8446><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> causeth them to err <S%H8582><s%>.

The slothful <S%H7423><s%> man roasteth <S%H2760><s%> not that which he took in hunting <S%H6718><s%>; But the precious <S%H3368><s%> substance <S%H1952><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> is to the diligent <S%H2742><s%>.
In the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is life <S%H2416><s%>; And in the pathway <S%H5410><s%> thereof there is no death <S%H4194><s%>.
